news.title: KI-Pionier Karpathy: Der einzige Weg für Bildung im KI-Zeitalter ist komplette Transformation
news.description: Kaum ein Bereich verändert sich so stark durch generative KI wie das Bildungssystem. Der KI-Pionier Andrej Karpathy fordert nun grundlegende Änderungen: Hausaufgaben lassen sich nicht mehr zuverlässig

news.title: Expanding data residency access to business customers worldwide
news.description: OpenAI expands data residency for ChatGPT Enterprise, ChatGPT Edu, and the API Platform, enabling eligible customers to store data at rest in-region.

news.title: Our approach to mental health-related litigation
news.description: We’re sharing our approach to mental health-related litigation. O handle sensitive cases with care, transparency, and respect while continuing to strengthen safety and support in ChatGPT.

news.title: Inside JetBrains—the company reshaping how the world writes code
news.description: JetBrains is integrating GPT-5 across its coding tools, helping millions of developers design, reason, and build software faster.

news.title: GPT-5 and the future of mathematical discovery
news.description: UCLA Professor Ernest Ryu and GPT-5 solved a key question in optimization theory, showcasing AI’s role in accelerating mathematical discovery.
